# This is the launcher that will be used by the O3DE_SDK.app bundle
# generated by the cmake install process for Mac. 
if(NOT ${PAL_PLATFORM_NAME} STREQUAL Mac)
    return()
endif()

ly_add_target(
    NAME O3DE_SDK EXECUTABLE
    NAMESPACE AZ
    FILES_CMAKE
        O3DE_SDK_files.cmake
    BUILD_DEPENDENCIES
        PRIVATE
            AZ::AzCore
            AZ::AzFramework
)
